jobs.name: executeTrade
jobs.description: Execute a prediction market trade on Kalshi, Polymarket, Opinion Labs, or Limitless. Supports buy/sell orders for YES/NO outcomes with slippage protection. Returns transaction hash, execution price, and explorer link.

platform.description: Trading platform: kalshi, polymarket, opinion, or limitless

outcome.description: Outcome to trade: yes or no

max_slippage_bps.description: Maximum slippage in basis points (optional, default 100)

jobs.deliverable: Trade execution result with success status, transaction hash, input/output amounts, execution price, and block explorer URL

jobs.name: getQuote
jobs.description: Get a real-time trade quote without executing. Returns expected output amount, price per token, price impact, and platform fees. Use this to evaluate trades before committing funds.

platform.description: Trading platform: kalshi, polymarket, opinion, or limitless

outcome.description: Outcome to quote: yes or no

jobs.deliverable: Quote with input amount, expected output tokens, price per token, price impact in basis points, fee amount, and expiration timestamp

jobs.name: searchMarkets
jobs.description: Search prediction markets across Kalshi, Polymarket, Opinion Labs, and Limitless. Returns market ID, title, current YES/NO prices, 24h volume, and expiration date. Filter by platform or search all.

query.description: Search query (e.g., bitcoin price, super bowl)

jobs.deliverable: Array of matching markets with platform, market_id, title, yes_price, no_price, volume_24h, and end_date

jobs.name: getPortfolio
jobs.description: Retrieve your agent's current prediction market positions held with Spredd. Returns position details including platform, market, outcome, entry price, current price, and unrealized P&L.

platforms.description: Optional filter by platforms: [kalshi, polymarket, opinion, limitless]

jobs.deliverable: Portfolio with positions array (platform, market_id, market_title, outcome, amount, entry_price, current_price, pnl), total_value, and total_pnl

jobs.name: bridgeUsdc
jobs.description: Bridge USDC between supported chains: Base, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Ethereum. Uses LI.FI and Circle CCTP for secure, fast cross-chain transfers with minimal slippage.

source_chain.description: Source chain: base, polygon, arbitrum, optimism, or ethereum

dest_chain.description: Destination chain: base, polygon, arbitrum, optimism, or ethereum

jobs.deliverable: Bridge result with success status, source_tx_hash, dest_tx_hash, amount_sent, amount_received, and explorer_url
